reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A front view portrait of Sarah.
A front view portrait of Gus.

A medium shot of a woman in her late 40s with short brown hair, standing outside and facing the camera. The woman, positioned in the center of the frame, is wearing loose-fitting clothes. Her face shows exhaustion, but her eyes reflect a newfound strength. A medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog sits beside the woman on the left, panting, yet alert. A lighthouse looms behind the woman. The sea stretches out on the right side of the frame. The lighting is soft, suggesting early morning or late afternoon, casting a gentle glow on the scene. The color palette is muted, creating a serene and contemplative atmosphere.
text_prompt:
Create an image based on the following guidance: 
 The scene is a wide shot of a lighthouse on the right side of the frame. On the left side of the frame stands a woman in her late 40s with short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes. Beside her stands a medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog. The woman should reference Image 0. The dog should reference Image 3. The lighthouse and the scene should reference Image 6.
